com.googlecode.edacious
Interface Edacious

All Known Implementing Classes:
EdaciousImpl
public interface Edacious

Main interface for dealing with the withings api.

Author:
jon

setPublic

void setPublic(java.lang.Long userId,
               java.lang.String publicKey,
               boolean isPublic)
               throws EdaciousException
For a user's data to be accessible through this API, a prior authorization has to be given. This can be done directly from the 'Share' overlay of the user Dashboard, or through this service. Please note that setting the ispublic flag to zero automatically changes the publickey of the user to a new random value.

Throws:
EdaciousException

addSubscription

void addSubscription(java.lang.Long userId,
                     java.lang.String publicKey,
                     java.lang.String callbackUrl)
                     throws EdaciousException
This service allows third parties to subscribe to notifications. Once the notification service has been subscribed, the WBS API will notify the subscriber whenever the target user's measurements or objectives are added, modified or deleted. This allows third party applications to remain in sync with user's data. To monitor a user, its userid and publickey are needed. Please note that unless the subscribed users have made their measurements data public, no notifications will be sent (see setPublic on how to enable it).

Throws:
EdaciousException

removeSubscription

void removeSubscription(java.lang.Long userId,
                        java.lang.String publicKey,
                        java.lang.String callbackUrl)
                        throws EdaciousException
The opposite of addSubscription.

Throws:
EdaciousException

getSubscription

java.util.Date getSubscription(java.lang.Long userId,
                               java.lang.String publicKey,
                               java.lang.String callbackUrl)
                               throws EdaciousException
Get information about a subscription. Currently only the expiration date is retrieved.

Returns:
The Date that the subscription expires.
Throws:
EdaciousException
